label.description: The label or name of the deal pipeline.

displayOrder.description: The ordering of the deal pipeline for display.

active.description: Indicates if the deal pipeline is currently active or not.

stages.description: List of deal stages within the pipeline.

label.description: The label or name of the deal stage.

displayOrder.description: The ordering of the deal stage for display within the pipeline.

metadata.description: Additional information related to the deal stage.

isClosed.description: Indicates if the deal stage is considered closed or not.

probability.description: The probability of closing a deal at this stage.

stageId.description: The unique identifier of the deal stage.

createdAt.description: Timestamp for the creation date of the deal stage.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp for the last update to the deal stage.

active.description: Indicates if the deal stage is currently active or not.

objectType.description: The type of object this deal pipeline is associated with.

objectTypeId.description: The ID of the object type this deal pipeline is associated with.

pipelineId.description: The unique identifier of the deal pipeline.

createdAt.description: Timestamp for the creation date of the deal pipeline.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp for the last update to the deal pipeline.

default.description: Indicates if this pipeline is the default one in the system.
